attributes.action: Give us a list of the alcohol units consumed per week by each member of the cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are sick of being told what you can and can't drink, eat, smoke etc, sign this petition.  I would be most interested in wet sales over the House of Common bar.

Come on boys, how many units do you drink?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
